option.name: projectJson
option.value: {"bootVersion":{"major":2,"minor":1,"patch":7,"qualifier":{"id":"RELEASE","separator":"."},"originalText":"2.1.7.RELEASE"},"modules":[{"name":"Developer Tools","values":[{"id":"devtools","name":"Spring Boot DevTools","description":"Provides fast application restarts, LiveReload, and configurations for enhanced development experience.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-devtools","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"lombok","name":"Lombok","description":"Java annotation library which helps to reduce boilerplate code.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.projectlombok","artifactId":"lombok","scope":"annotationProcessor"},{"id":"configuration-processor","name":"Spring Configuration Processor","description":"Generate metadata for developers to offer contextual help and \"code completion\" when working with custom configuration keys (ex.application.properties/.yml files).","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-configuration-processor","scope":"annotationProcessor"}]},{"name":"Web","values":[{"id":"web","name":"Spring Web","description":"Build web, including RESTful, applications using Spring MVC. Uses Apache Tomcat as the default embedded container.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-web","scope":"compile"},{"id":"webflux","name":"Spring Reactive Web","description":"Build reactive web applications with Spring WebFlux and Netty.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-webflux","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-rest","name":"Rest Repositories","description":"Exposing Spring Data repositories over REST via Spring Data REST.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-rest","scope":"compile"},{"id":"session","name":"Spring Session","description":"Provides an API and implementations for managing user session information.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.session","artifactId":"spring-session-core","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-rest-hal","name":"Rest Repositories HAL Browser","description":"Browsing Spring Data REST repositories in your browser.","versionRange":"[2.0.0.RELEASE,2.2.0-M1)","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.data","artifactId":"spring-data-rest-hal-browser","scope":"compile"},{"id":"hateoas","name":"Spring HATEOAS","description":"Eases the creation of RESTful APIs that follow the HATEOAS principle when working with Spring / Spring MVC.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-hateoas","scope":"compile"},{"id":"web-services","name":"Spring Web Services","description":"Facilitates contract-first SOAP development. Allows for the creation of flexible web services using one of the many ways to manipulate XML payloads.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-web-services","scope":"compile"},{"id":"jersey","name":"Jersey","description":"Framework for developing RESTful Web Services in Java that provides support for JAX-RS APIs.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-jersey","scope":"compile"},{"id":"vaadin","name":"Vaadin","description":"Java framework for building rich client apps based on Web components.","versionRange":"[2.0.0.RELEASE,2.5.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"com.vaadin","artifactId":"vaadin-bom","version":"14.4.5"},"groupId":"com.vaadin","artifactId":"vaadin-spring-boot-starter","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Template Engines","values":[{"id":"thymeleaf","name":"Thymeleaf","description":"A modern server-side Java template engine for both web and standalone environments. Allows HTML to be correctly displayed in browsers and as static prototypes.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-thymeleaf","scope":"compile"},{"id":"freemarker","name":"Apache Freemarker","description":"Java library to generate text output (HTML web pages, e-mails, configuration files, source code, etc.) based on templates and changing data.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-freemarker","scope":"compile"},{"id":"mustache","name":"Mustache","description":"Logic-less Templates. There are no if statements, else clauses, or for loops. Instead there are only tags.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-mustache","scope":"compile"},{"id":"groovy-templates","name":"Groovy Templates","description":"Groovy templating engine.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-groovy-templates","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Security","values":[{"id":"security","name":"Spring Security","description":"Highly customizable authentication and access-control framework for Spring applications.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-security","scope":"compile"},{"id":"oauth2-client","name":"OAuth2 Client","description":"Spring Boot integration for Spring Security\u0027s OAuth2/OpenID Connect client features.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-oauth2-client","scope":"compile"},{"id":"oauth2-resource-server","name":"OAuth2 Resource Server","description":"Spring Boot integration for Spring Security\u0027s OAuth2 resource server features.","versionRange":"2.1.0.M2","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-oauth2-resource-server","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-ldap","name":"Spring LDAP","description":"Makes it easier to build Spring based applications that use the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-ldap","scope":"compile"},{"id":"okta","name":"Okta","description":"Okta specific configuration for Spring Security/Spring Boot OAuth2 features. Enable your Spring Boot application to work with Okta via OAuth 2.0/OIDC.","versionRange":"[2.1.2.RELEASE,2.5.0-M1)","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.okta.spring","artifactId":"okta-spring-boot-starter","version":"1.2.1","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"SQL","values":[{"id":"jdbc","name":"JDBC API","description":"Database Connectivity API that defines how a client may connect and query a database.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-jdbc","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-jpa","name":"Spring Data JPA","description":"Persist data in SQL stores with Java Persistence API using Spring Data and Hibernate.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-jpa","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-jdbc","name":"Spring Data JDBC","description":"Persist data in SQL stores with plain JDBC using Spring Data.","versionRange":"2.1.0.RELEASE","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-jdbc","scope":"compile"},{"id":"mybatis","name":"MyBatis Framework","description":"Persistence framework with support for custom SQL, stored procedures and advanced mappings. MyBatis couples objects with stored procedures or SQL statements using a XML descriptor or annotations.","versionRange":"[2.0.0.RELEASE,2.5.0-M1)","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.mybatis.spring.boot","artifactId":"mybatis-spring-boot-starter","version":"2.1.4","scope":"compile"},{"id":"liquibase","name":"Liquibase Migration","description":"Liquibase database migration and source control library.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.liquibase","artifactId":"liquibase-core","scope":"compile"},{"id":"flyway","name":"Flyway Migration","description":"Version control for your database so you can migrate from any version (incl. an empty database) to the latest version of the schema.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.flywaydb","artifactId":"flyway-core","scope":"compile"},{"id":"jooq","name":"JOOQ Access Layer","description":"Generate Java code from your database and build type safe SQL queries through a fluent API.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-jooq","scope":"compile"},{"id":"derby","name":"Apache Derby Database","description":"An open source relational database implemented entirely in Java.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.apache.derby","artifactId":"derby","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"h2","name":"H2 Database","description":"Provides a fast in-memory database that supports JDBC API and R2DBC access, with a small (2mb) footprint. Supports embedded and server modes as well as a browser based console application.","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.h2database","artifactId":"h2","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"hsql","name":"HyperSQL Database","description":"Lightweight 100% Java SQL Database Engine.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.hsqldb","artifactId":"hsqldb","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"mariadb","name":"MariaDB Driver","description":"MariaDB JDBC and R2DBC driver.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.mariadb.jdbc","artifactId":"mariadb-java-client","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"sqlserver","name":"MS SQL Server Driver","description":"A JDBC and R2DBC driver that provides access to Microsoft SQL Server and Azure SQL Database from any Java application.","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.microsoft.sqlserver","artifactId":"mssql-jdbc","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"mysql","name":"MySQL Driver","description":"MySQL JDBC and R2DBC driver.","repositories":[],"groupId":"mysql","artifactId":"mysql-connector-java","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"postgresql","name":"PostgreSQL Driver","description":"A JDBC and R2DBC driver that allows Java programs to connect to a PostgreSQL database using standard, database independent Java code.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.postgresql","artifactId":"postgresql","scope":"runtime"}]},{"name":"NoSQL","values":[{"id":"data-redis","name":"Spring Data Redis (Access+Driver)","description":"Advanced and thread-safe Java Redis client for synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive usage. Supports Cluster, Sentinel, Pipelining, Auto-Reconnect, Codecs and much more.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-redis","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-redis-reactive","name":"Spring Data Reactive Redis","description":"Access Redis key-value data stores in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Redis.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-redis-reactive","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-mongodb","name":"Spring Data MongoDB","description":"Store data in flexible, JSON-like documents, meaning fields can vary from document to document and data structure can be changed over time.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-mongodb","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-mongodb-reactive","name":"Spring Data Reactive MongoDB","description":"Provides asynchronous stream processing with non-blocking back pressure for MongoDB.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-mongodb-reactive","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-elasticsearch","name":"Spring Data Elasticsearch (Access+Driver)","description":"A distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine with Spring Data Elasticsearch.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-elasticsearch","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-solr","name":"Spring Data for Apache Solr","description":"Apache Solr is an open source enterprise search platform built on Apache Lucene.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-solr","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-cassandra","name":"Spring Data for Apache Cassandra","description":"A free and open-source, distributed, NoSQL database management system that offers high-scalability and high-performance.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-cassandra","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-cassandra-reactive","name":"Spring Data Reactive for Apache Cassandra","description":"Access Cassandra NoSQL Database in a reactive fashion.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-cassandra-reactive","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-couchbase","name":"Spring Data Couchbase","description":"NoSQL document-oriented database that offers in memory-first architecture, geo-distributed deployments, and workload isolation.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-couchbase","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-couchbase-reactive","name":"Spring Data Reactive Couchbase","description":"Access Couchbase NoSQL database in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Couchbase.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-couchbase-reactive","scope":"compile"},{"id":"data-neo4j","name":"Spring Data Neo4j","description":"An open source NoSQL database that stores data structured as graphs consisting of nodes, connected by relationships.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-data-neo4j","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Messaging","values":[{"id":"integration","name":"Spring Integration","description":"Adds support for Enterprise Integration Patterns. Enables lightweight messaging and supports integration with external systems via declarative adapters.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-integration","scope":"compile"},{"id":"amqp","name":"Spring for RabbitMQ","description":"Gives your applications a common platform to send and receive messages, and your messages a safe place to live until received.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-amqp","scope":"compile"},{"id":"kafka","name":"Spring for Apache Kafka","description":"Publish, subscribe, store, and process streams of records.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.kafka","artifactId":"spring-kafka","scope":"compile"},{"id":"kafka-streams","name":"Spring for Apache Kafka Streams","description":"Building stream processing applications with Apache Kafka Streams.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.apache.kafka","artifactId":"kafka-streams","scope":"compile"},{"id":"activemq","name":"Spring for Apache ActiveMQ 5","description":"Spring JMS support with Apache ActiveMQ \u0027Classic\u0027.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-activemq","scope":"compile"},{"id":"artemis","name":"Spring for Apache ActiveMQ Artemis","description":"Spring JMS support with Apache ActiveMQ Artemis.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-artemis","scope":"compile"},{"id":"websocket","name":"WebSocket","description":"Build WebSocket applications with SockJS and STOMP.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-websocket","scope":"compile"},{"id":"camel","name":"Apache Camel","description":"Apache Camel is an open source integration framework that empowers you to quickly and easily integrate various systems consuming or producing data.","versionRange":"[2.0.0.M1,2.5.0-M1)","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.apache.camel","artifactId":"camel-spring-boot-starter","version":"2.25.2","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"I/O","values":[{"id":"batch","name":"Spring Batch","description":"Batch applications with transactions, retry/skip and chunk based processing.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-batch","scope":"compile"},{"id":"validation","name":"Validation","description":"Bean Validation with Hibernate validator.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-validation","scope":"compile"},{"id":"mail","name":"Java Mail Sender","description":"Send email using Java Mail and Spring Framework\u0027s JavaMailSender.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-mail","scope":"compile"},{"id":"quartz","name":"Quartz Scheduler","description":"Schedule jobs using Quartz.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-quartz","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cache","name":"Spring cache abstraction","description":"Provides cache-related operations, such as the ability to update the content of the cache, but does not provide the actual data store.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-cache","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Ops","values":[{"id":"actuator","name":"Spring Boot Actuator","description":"Supports built in (or custom) endpoints that let you monitor and manage your application - such as application health, metrics, sessions, etc.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-actuator","scope":"compile"},{"id":"codecentric-spring-boot-admin-client","name":"Codecentric\u0027s Spring Boot Admin (Client)","description":"Required for your application to register with a Codecentric\u0027s Spring Boot Admin Server instance.","versionRange":"[2.0.0.RELEASE,2.5.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"de.codecentric","artifactId":"spring-boot-admin-dependencies","version":"2.1.6"},"groupId":"de.codecentric","artifactId":"spring-boot-admin-starter-client","scope":"compile"},{"id":"codecentric-spring-boot-admin-server","name":"Codecentric\u0027s Spring Boot Admin (Server)","description":"A community project to manage and monitor your Spring Boot applications. Provides a UI on top of the Spring Boot Actuator endpoints.","versionRange":"[2.0.0.RELEASE,2.5.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"de.codecentric","artifactId":"spring-boot-admin-dependencies","version":"2.1.6"},"groupId":"de.codecentric","artifactId":"spring-boot-admin-starter-server","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Observability","values":[{"id":"datadog","name":"Datadog","description":"Datadog is a dimensional time-series SAAS with built-in dashboarding and alerting.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-datadog","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"influx","name":"Influx","description":"Support real-time stream processing and storage of time-series data.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-influx","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"graphite","name":"Graphite","description":"Hierarchical metrics systems backed by a fixed-size database.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-graphite","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"new-relic","name":"New Relic","description":"SaaS offering with a full UI and a query language called NRQL.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-new-relic","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"prometheus","name":"Prometheus","description":"An in-memory dimensional time series database with a simple built-in UI, a custom query language, and math operations.","repositories":[],"groupId":"io.micrometer","artifactId":"micrometer-registry-prometheus","scope":"runtime"},{"id":"wavefront","name":"Wavefront","description":"Tanzu Observability by Wavefront is a SaaS-based metrics monitoring and analytics platform that lets you visualize, query, and alert over data from across your entire stack (infrastructure, network, custom app metrics, business KPIs, etc.)","versionRange":"2.1.0.RELEASE","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"com.wavefront","artifactId":"wavefront-spring-boot-bom","version":"2.0.2"},"groupId":"com.wavefront","artifactId":"wavefront-spring-boot-starter","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Testing","values":[{"id":"restdocs","name":"Spring REST Docs","description":"Document RESTful services by combining hand-written with Asciidoctor and auto-generated snippets produced with Spring MVC Test.","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.restdocs","artifactId":"spring-restdocs-mockmvc","scope":"test"},{"id":"testcontainers","name":"Testcontainers","description":"Provide lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.testcontainers","artifactId":"testcontainers-bom","version":"1.15.1"},"groupId":"org.testcontainers","artifactId":"junit-jupiter","scope":"test"},{"id":"cloud-contract-verifier","name":"Contract Verifier","description":"Moves TDD to the level of software architecture by enabling Consumer Driven Contract (CDC) development.","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"Greenwich.SR6"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-contract-verifier","scope":"test"},{"id":"cloud-contract-stub-runner","name":"Contract Stub Runner","description":"Stub Runner for HTTP/Messaging based communication. Allows creating WireMock stubs from RestDocs tests.","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"Greenwich.SR6"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-contract-stub-runner","scope":"test"},{"id":"unboundid-ldap","name":"Embedded LDAP Server","description":"Provides a platform neutral way for running a LDAP server in unit tests.","repositories":[],"groupId":"com.unboundid","artifactId":"unboundid-ldapsdk","scope":"test"},{"id":"flapdoodle-mongo","name":"Embedded MongoDB Database","description":"Provides a platform neutral way for running MongoDB in unit tests.","repositories":[],"groupId":"de.flapdoodle.embed","artifactId":"de.flapdoodle.embed.mongo","scope":"test"}]},{"name":"Spring Cloud","values":[{"id":"cloud-starter","name":"Cloud Bootstrap","description":"Non-specific Spring Cloud features, unrelated to external libraries or integrations (e.g. Bootstrap context and @RefreshScope).","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"Greenwich.SR6"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cloud-function","name":"Function","description":"Promotes the implementation of business logic via functions and supports a uniform programming model across serverless providers, as well as the ability to run standalone (locally or in a PaaS).","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"Greenwich.SR6"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-function-context","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cloud-task","name":"Task","description":"Allows a user to develop and run short lived microservices using Spring Cloud. Run them locally, in the cloud, and on Spring Cloud Data Flow.","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"Greenwich.SR6"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-task","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Spring Cloud Security","values":[{"id":"cloud-security","name":"Cloud Security","description":"A declarative model which can be heavily configured externally (or centrally) lends itself to the implementation of large systems of co-operating, remote components, usually with a central indentity management service.","versionRange":"[2.0.0.RELEASE,2.4.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"Greenwich.SR6"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-security","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cloud-oauth2","name":"Cloud OAuth2","description":"OAuth2 and distributed application patterns with spring-cloud-security.","versionRange":"[2.0.0.RELEASE,2.4.0-M1)","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"Greenwich.SR6"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-oauth2","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Spring Cloud Tools","values":[{"id":"cloud-connectors","name":"Cloud Connectors","description":"Simplifies the process of connecting to services and gaining operating environment awareness in cloud platforms such as Cloud Foundry and Heroku.","versionRange":"[2.0.0.RELEASE,2.3.0.M1)","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.boot","artifactId":"spring-boot-starter-cloud-connectors","scope":"compile"},{"id":"open-service-broker","name":"Open Service Broker","description":"Framework for building Spring Boot apps that implement the Open Service Broker API, which can deliver services to applications running within cloud native platforms such as Cloud Foundry, Kubernetes and OpenShift.","versionRange":"[2.0.0.RELEASE,2.4.0-M1)","repositories":[],"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-open-service-broker","version":"3.0.4.RELEASE","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Spring Cloud Config","values":[{"id":"cloud-config-client","name":"Config Client","description":"Client that connects to a Spring Cloud Config Server to fetch the application\u0027s configuration.","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"Greenwich.SR6"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-config","scope":"compile"},{"id":"cloud-config-server","name":"Config Configuration","description":"Provides client-side support for externalized configuration in a distributed system. The patterns provided include Service Discovery, Distributed Configuration and Control Bus.","repositories":[],"bom":{"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-dependencies","version":"Greenwich.SR6"},"groupId":"org.springframework.cloud","artifactId":"spring-cloud-starter-consul-config","scope":"compile"}]},{"name":"Spring
